item.title: Introduction
item.description: How to use this documentation # This documentation is organised as a chronological progression through the typical setup of new users of the MRC WIMM CCB services. We encourage readers to follow instructions in this documentation in the order presented. Following instructions out of order or skipping instructions is likely to produce unexpected results. Get started # ðŸ‘‰ The MRC WIMM CCB services are available to members of staff and close collaborators.
